page.title: 02Taxis in Immingham
page.content:
Many people in{Immingham}do not have a car so the{taxi}service is important.The seamen from the docks often need a{taxi}quickly because they do not want to wait for a bus.The most popular destinations from the Docks are the shops in{Immingham,}the public houses in{Immingham}and the shops in Grimsby.There are eight{Hackney {Carriage}licences in the town and approximately eight{private-hire cars. All the{taxis}have radios in them so that they can contact their base which is usually the owner's house.The busiest time of the week is Friday evening/night with people going late-night shopping,Bingo,visits to public houses and discos.
(continued)
